General.Name: SKONEC Entertainment Co. Ltd.
General.Description: SKONEC Entertainment Co., Ltd. engages in the virtual reality (VR) content development business in South Korea. It develops VR games and content for consumers in various genres; space-based virtual reality systems and contents that can be used in industries that require the same level of training as in reality, such as chemistry, firefighting, national defense, and public security; and virtual space real-time communication solutions. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
